channel.title: Clean Water State Revolving Fund
channel.description: Updated Clean Water State Revolving Fund content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: One-year Extension of the Short-Term National Product Waiver for Stainless Steel Nuts and Bolts, January 18, 2017
item.description:
Approved national waiver of the AIS requirement.

  • One-Year Extension of the Short-Term National Product Waiver for Stainless Steel Nuts and Bolts Used in Pipe Couplings, Restraints, Joints, Flanges, and Saddles (PDF)(2 pp, 360 K, January 18, 2017)
item.dc:creator: kfarber

item.title: Request for AIS Waiver for Steel Fibers for Precast Concrete Tunnel Segmental Liner for Akron, Ohio
item.description:
The following waiver request has been received by EPA. The 15-day public comment period is closed. EPA is currently reviewing the waiver request.

  • AIS Waiver Request for Steel Fibers for Precast Concrete Tunnel Segmental Liner for Akron, Ohio (PDF)(26 pp, 887 K)
item.dc:creator: kfarber

item.title: Request for AIS Waiver for 30-inch Well Casing for Punta Gorda, Florida
item.description:
The following waiver request has been received by EPA. The 15-day public comment period is closed. EPA is currently reviewing the waiver request.

  • AIS Waiver Request for 30-inch Well Casing for Punta Gorda, Florida (PDF)(3 pp, 967 K)
item.dc:creator: kfarber

item.title: DRAFT One-Year Extension of the Short-Term National Product Waiver for Stainless Steel Nuts and Bolts used in Pipe Couplings, Restraints, Joints, Flanges and Saddles for State Revolving Fund Projects
item.description:
COMMENT PERIOD CLOSES JANUARY 7, 2017: DRAFT one-year extension of the short-term national product waiver for stainless steel nuts and bolts used in pipe couplings, restraints, joints, flanges and saddles for State Revolving Fund projects.

  • DRAFT One-Year Extension of the Short-Term National Product Waiver for Stainless Steel Nuts and Bolts used in Pipe Couplings, Restraints, Joints, Flanges and Saddles for State Revolving Fund Projects (PDF)(2 pp, 129 K)
item.dc:creator: kfarber

item.title: Public Interest Waiver of American Iron and Steel Requirements to Bayshore, New Jersey for Stainless Steel Butterfly Valves
item.description:
Product specific project waivers apply only to the specified product and proposed project referenced in the waiver. Any other project that wishes to use a similar product must apply for a separate waiver based on specific project circumstances.

  • Public Interest Waiver of American Iron and Steel Requirements to Bayshore, New Jersey for Stainless Steel Butterfly Valves (PDF)(2 pp, 359 K, December 16, 2016)
item.dc:creator: kfarber
